p: Those cytokines observed at elevated levels in association with CRS – especially TNF, IL-6 and IL-1β – are inhibitors of tissue-factor, protein-C-system and antithrombin-mediated inhibition of thrombin (José, Williams and Chambers 2014). Consequently, CRS may be an inflammatory etiology for increased risk of coagulopathy in COVID-19 patients. CRS prerogative state is also characterized by disseminated intravascular coagulopathy leading to multi-organ failure (figure 1) (Tang et al. 2020). Such coagulopathies have been linked to cardiac injury in COVID-19 patients (Varga et al. 2020).
